source: قانون بودجه سال 1400 كل كشور - HTML text file

total_budget.text: بيست و هشت ميليون و هشتصد و بيست و سه هزار و سيصد و نود و هشت ميليارد و چهارصد و پنجاه و هفت ميليون
total_budget.note: Total budget for all country (revenues and expenditures)

general_government_budget.text: سيزده ميليون و هفتصد و سي و هفت هزار و ششصد و نود و نه ميليارد و دويست و شصت و هشت ميليون
general_government_budget.note: General government budget (revenues + asset transfers and expenses + asset acquisitions)

general_resources.text: دوازده ميليون و هفتصد و هفتاد و نه هزار و دويست و نه ميليارد و سيصد و پنجاه و شش ميليون

specific_ministry_revenues.text: نهصد و پنجاه و هشت هزار و چهارصد و هشتاد و نه ميليارد و نهصد و دوازده ميليون
specific_ministry_revenues.note: Specific revenues of ministries and government institutions (درآمد اختصاصي)

state_enterprises_budget.text: پانزده ميليون و هفتصد و سيزده هزار و دويست و هفده ميليارد و هشتصد و چهل و سه ميليون
state_enterprises_budget.note: Budget of state enterprises, banks and profitable institutions (both revenues and expenses)

ceiling.text: يك ميليون و نهصد و نود و دو هزار و هفتصد و بيست ميليارد
ceiling.note: Ceiling for oil exports + gas condensate + net gas exports (رديف 210101، 210102، 210109)

national_development_fund_share.note: Share of National Development Fund from oil and gas exports

nioc_share.note: Share of National Iranian Oil Company (exempt from dividend and tax)

notes: All figures in billion rials unless specified
Oil revenue ceiling: 1,992,720 billion rials (about $1.99 quadrillion rials)
Government can only spend 9,379,209,356 billion rials initially
Additional 3,400,000 billion rials can be allocated after 6 months if revenues materialize
National Development Fund gets 20% of first 1M barrels/day, 38% above that
Preferential currency rate up to $8 billion for basic goods, medicine, medical equipment
